ToVector2D.summary: Transforms a 3D vector to a 2D vector from one rotation to another.
ToVector2D.param: The 3D Component to use for rotation.
The 2D Component to use for rotation.

ToVector.summary: Transforms a 2D vector to a 3D vector from one rotation to another.
ToVector.param: The original 3D vector. Used to determine the z outcome.
The 2D Component to use for rotation.
The 3D Component to use for rotation.
